post_detail.description: Click 3X produced a series of four product demonstration videos for OnStar.  These product demonstration videos cover not only specific features of the OnStar service, but also introduce and explain the OnStar service as a whole. Produced for three different markets (US, Mexico, and the Middle East), Click 3X was given an interesting design challenge: creating language independent videos that could be understood in all markets without the use of translation services.  Starting with minimal assets, Click 3X performed a full creative exploration incorporating our interactive, CGI, and animation departments to produce the :45 second final spots.
post_detail.title: What is OnStar
